metadata.description: LLM-generated business rules governing agent behavior and social dynamics

recommendation_mechanics.description: Core mechanics governing how recommendations spread and popularity evolves

social_media_boost.description: Popularity increase per satisfied tourist social media share
social_media_boost.reasoning: Modern tourists heavily influence destination popularity through social sharing

word_of_mouth_range.description: Grid cell radius for direct tourist-to-tourist recommendations
word_of_mouth_range.reasoning: Physical proximity enables face-to-face recommendations with higher trust

viral_threshold.description: Popularity threshold above which viral amplification effects occur
viral_threshold.reasoning: Destinations reaching critical mass experience self-reinforcing popularity growth

decay_rate.description: Daily popularity decay rate without fresh visitor activity
decay_rate.reasoning: Destination popularity naturally fades without continuous positive reinforcement

capacity_penalty.description: Popularity reduction multiplier when destination exceeds capacity
capacity_penalty.reasoning: Overcrowding significantly reduces visitor satisfaction and future recommendations
